body_html:
@drpngx I apply those changes to cc files in clone of tensorflow in my machine and then I try to apply changes in cc files by this codes:
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
sudo pip install /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-0.12.1-py2-none-any.whl

but, it seems that those changes are not applied. May I ask am i doing it correctly?
Thanks
